description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the Windows Layer-2 Bridge Network Driver denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2024-38146):

1. Identify your Windows version and architecture (32-bit or 64-bit).
2. Download and apply the appropriate KB update from the official Microsoft Catalog:
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems, download from: [KB5041580](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041580)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems, download from: [KB5041580](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041580)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems, download from: [KB5041592](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041592)
3. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses vulnerabilities in the Windows Layer-2 Bridge Network Driver that could lead to denial of service.
- Ensure your system is updated to the specified build numbers and versions for compatibility.

**Preconditions**:
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
- Verify that your system falls within the specified build numbers: [10, 0, 19044, 4780], [10, 0, 22631, 4037], etc.
